Federal Guidance Updates

  • Category of Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) Agency Internal Revenue Service (IRS)
    Treasury Sets Out Proposed Rules for Transformative Clean Hydrogen Incentives published Dec 22, 2023

    On December 22nd, the Treasury Department and IRS published a Notice of Public Rulemaking (NPRM) setting forth guidance for claiming the §45V Clean Hydrogen Production Tax Credit established under last year’s Inflation Reduction Act.

December 2023 Federal Guidance Updates

  • Category of Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) Agency U.S. Department of Transportation (DOT)
    Biden-Harris Administration Opens Applications for Over $9 Billion in Funding to Modernize Nation’s Bridges published Dec 20, 2023

    On December 20th, the U.S. Department of Transportation’s Federal Highway Administration announced today that it has opened applications for $9.7 billion in multi-year (FY2023 through FY2026) funding to improve the nation’s bridges.

  • Category of Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) Agency Department of Energy (DOE)
    Biden-Harris Administration Announces $40 Million to Train the Clean Energy Workforce published Dec 20, 2023

    On December 20th, the Department of Energy announced that it would begin accepting applications for the Energy Auditor Training program (EAT), which will provide up to $40 million in grants for states to train individuals to conduct energy audits or surveys of commercial and residential buildings

  • Category of Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) Agency Department of Homeland Security (DHS)
    Biden-Harris Administration Announces $150 Million to Help Underserved Communities Receive Low-Interest Loans for Resilience Projects published Dec 19, 2023

    On December 19th, FEMA announced the opening of the second funding opportunity for the Safeguarding Tomorrow Revolving Loan Fund (RLF) grant program to make communities safer from natural hazards.

  • Category of Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) Agency Internal Revenue Service (IRS)
    Treasury Issues Proposed Guidance to Drive Advanced Clean Energy Manufacturing and Secure, Resilient Energy Supply Chains published Dec 14, 2023

    On December 14th, the Department of the Treasury issued a Notice of Proposed Rulemaking (NPRM) proposing rules for claiming the §45X Advanced Manufacturing Production Tax Credit (PTC), an incentive created by the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA).

  • Category of Bipartisan Infrastructure Law (BIL) Agency department of energy (doe)
    Department of Energy Releases Proposed Interpretive Guidance on Foreign Entity of Concern for Public Comment published Dec 1, 2023

    On December 1st, the U.S. Department of Energy released a notice of its proposed guidance and a request for public comment on its proposed interpretation of the statutory definition of “foreign entity of concern” (FEOC) in the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law, which is designed to limit the participation of FEOCs within government-supported domestic battery supply chains and bolster the growth of domestic and friend-shored battery materials processing and manufacturing.

  • Category of Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) Agency Internal Revenue Service (IRS)
    Treasury, IRS provide guidance for those who manufacture new clean vehicles published Dec 1, 2023

    On December 1st, Department of the Treasury and the Internal Revenue Service issued two items of guidance on the excluded entity restriction of the section 30D clean vehicle credit, as amended by the Inflation Reduction Act.
